title: IT Systems Administrator
description: Implemented and managed data backup strategies, ensuring business continuity and disaster recovery readiness. Reduced system downtime by 90% through proactive monitoring and early threat detection. Optimized application performance, reducing downtime by 60%. Researched and integrated emerging technologies to enhance security and scalability.

title: Lead System Architect
description: Designed and implemented automation frameworks, optimizing workflows. Deployed scalable cloud-native infrastructure, reducing operational overhead by 40%. Led AI technology deployment and managed automation pipelines. Optimized business processes through analytics and implemented security best practices.

title: Technical Support Engineer
description: Performed in-depth diagnostics and root-cause analysis. Translated complex technical concepts into clear insights. Provided expert technical guidance and preventive maintenance recommendations. Collaborated with engineering teams to enhance support processes.
